[API] [Sales Portal] [Customers]
NOT create customer with invalid data
Create Customer
Delete Customer
Get All Customers
Get Customer By Id
Should get order for customer with one order
Should get orders for customer with multiple orders
Should return empty orders array for new customer
Should fail with invalid token
Should fail for non-existent customer
[API] [Sales Portal] [Customers] > Creating customers with valid data
Create customer with 40 character length of name
Create customer with 1 character length of name
Create customer with 1 space in name
Create customer with valid email format
Create customer with 1 character length of city
Create customer with 20 character length of city
Create customer with 1 character length of street
Create customer with 40 character length of street
Create customer with 1 flat
Create customer with 9999 flat
Create customer with 999 house
Create customer with 250 notes
Create customer with a valid phone
Create customer without notes
Create customer with empty notes
Create customer with 1 house
[API] [Sales Portal] [Customers] > Creating customers with invalid data
41 character name customer is not created
0 character name customer is not created
Name with 2 spaces in customer is not created
Name with special characters in customer is not created
Customer without name is not created
Customer with invalid email is not created
0 flat of customer is not created
0 house of customer is not created
Without country customer is not created
10000 flat of customer is not created
1000 house of customer is not created
Customer without email is not created
Customer without phone is not created
Customer without house is not created
Customer without flat is not created
Customer without city is not created
Customer without street is not created
Negative price house customer is not created
Not integer flat customer is not created
Negative amount flat is not created
251 notes customer is not created
Notes with < or > symbols customer is not created

Search by name
Search by email
Search by country

SortField: createdOn, sortOrder: asc
SortField: createdOn, sortOrder: desc

[API] [Sales Portal] [Customers] > Smoke
Update customer
[API] [Sales Portal] [Customers] > NOT SMOKE
Should NOT update customer without token
Should NOT update customer with not existing id
Should NOT update customer with existing customer email
Should update customer with max valid data
Should update customer with min valid data
[API] [Sales Portal] [Notifications] - GET /api/notifications
Should return all notifications for authorized user
Should return no unread notifications if all are read
Should fail for unauthorized user
[API] [Sales Portal] [Notifications] - PATCH /api/notifications/mark-all-read
Should mark all notifications as read
Should fail for unauthorized user
[API] [Sales Portal] [Notifications] - PATCH /api/notifications/{notificationId}/read
Should mark single notification as read
Should fail for unauthorized user
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Assign Manager]
Should assign manager with valid orderId, managerId and token
Should NOT assign manager without token
Should NOT assign manager with non-existent orderId
Should NOT assign manager with empty managerId
Should NOT assign manager with missing orderId
Should NOT assign manager with invalid token
Should NOT assign manager with non-existent managerId
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Create]
Should create order with all valid data (token, valid customerId, productId) and one product
Should create order with all valid data (token, valid customerId, productId) and 5 products
Should NOT create order with all valid data (token, valid customerId, productId) and 6 products
Should NOT create order with invalid customerId
Should NOT create order with 1 invalid productId
Should NOT create order if one of productIds is invalid
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Delete]
Should delete order with valid id and token
Should NOT delete order with invalid token
Should NOT delete order without token
Should NOT delete order with non-existent orderId
Should create order and return it by schema (sanity, uses createOrderSchema)
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Comments] [Delete]
Should delete a comment with all valid data (token, orderId, commentId)
Should NOT delete a comment with orderId invalid (non existing)
Should NOT delete a comment with commentId invalid
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Get by ID]
Should get order with valid id and token
Should NOT get order with non-existent id
Should NOT get order with invalid token
Should NOT get order without token
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Unassign Manager]
Should unassign manager with valid orderId and token
Should NOT unassign manager with invalid token
Should NOT unassign manager without token
Should NOT unassign manager with non-existent orderId
Should allow unassigning when no manager is assigned (no error, history added)
[API] [Sales Portal] [Orders] [Update]
Should NOT update order with customer value missing
Should NOT update order with invalid token
Should update order with all valid data (token, valid customerId, productId)
Should NOT update order without token
Should NOT update order with non-existent customerId
Should NOT update order without products (empty array)
Should NOT update order with 1 invalid productId
Should NOT update order if one of productIds is invalid

Create product
NOT create product with invalid data

Should create product when name length is 3 characters
Should create product when name length is 40 characters
Should create product when name contains a single space
Should create product with price equal to 1
Should create product with price equal to 99999
Should create product with amount equal to 0
Should create product with amount equal to 999
Should create product when notes length is 250 characters
Should create product without notes field
Should create product when notes are empty
[API] [Sales Portal] [Products] > Creating products with invalid data
Should NOT create product when name length is 2 characters
Should NOT create product when name length is 41 characters
Should NOT create product when name contains two spaces
Should NOT create product when name contains special characters
Should NOT create product without name field
Should NOT create product when name is empty
Should NOT create product when price is 0
Should NOT create product without manufacturer field
Should NOT create product when price is 100000
Should NOT create product without price field
Should NOT create product when price is negative
Should NOT create product when price is not an integer number
Should NOT create product when amount is negative
Should NOT create product when amount is 1000
Should NOT create product without amount field
Should NOT create product when amount is not an integer number
Should NOT create product when notes length is 251 characters
Should NOT create product when notes contain '<' or '>' symbols

Should delete product successfully
[API] [Sales Portal] [Products] > Delete product > Negative
Should NOT delete product with empty token
Should NOT delete product with invalid token
Should NOT delete non-existent product
[API] [Sales Portal] [Products] > Get All Products > Positive
Should get all products successfully
[API] [Sales Portal] [Products] > Get All Products > Negative
Should NOT get all products with empty token
Should NOT get all products with invalid token

Should get product by id successfully

Should NOT get product by id with empty token
Should NOT get product by id with invalid token

Should update product successfully

Should NOT update product with empty token
Should NOT update product with invalid token

Field: Assigned Manager, direction: desc  sends correct API sort and updates UI

Field: Created On, direction: desc  sends correct API sort and updates UI
